  • Method Details

    • dropToken

      public void dropToken(char p, int c)
      Places a token for player p in the top-most open position of column c.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who is placing the token.
      c - The column where the token is placed.

    • whatsAtPos

      public char whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)
      Returns the character at the specific position on the game board.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position on the game board to check.
      Returns:
      The player whose piece is in that spot, or ' ' if the position is empty.

    • isPlayerAtPos

      public boolean isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char player)
      Checks if the specified player is at the given position on the game board.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position to check.
      player - The player to check if their token is at the position.
      Returns:
      True if the player is in that position, otherwise false.
